title: Le Pain Quotidien
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Mediterranean, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International restaurant chain featuring fresh artisan bakery and communal table. Has a few labeled vegan suitable dishes marked by a green carrot: vegan croissants, hummus, banana split. Soy milk available for drinks.
